definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: commissioner, deputy, overseer;—abs. ´[[פ]] Je 20:1 +; cstr. [[פְּקִיד]] 2Ch 24:11, Ne 11:22; sf. [[פְּקִידוֹ]] Ju Jdg 9:28; pl. [[פְּקִדִים]] Ge 41:34, Je 29:26, [[פְּקִידִים]] 2Ch 31:13, Es 2:3; —commissioner, for special duty Ge 41:34 (E), Es 2:3; permanent deputy of king Ju Jdg 9:28, of priest 2Ch 24:11, of Levites 2Ch 31:13; overseer, one in charge of men, c. [[עַל]] of soldiers 2Ki 25:19 = Je 52:25, Benjamites Ne 11:9, priests v:Ne 11:14; abs., without [[עַל]], Je 29:26 (of priest in temple, reading [[פָּקִיד]] Vrss. Gie), cf. Je 20:1 (v. [[נׇגִיד]]
); c. sf. of Levites Ne 11:22, singers Ne 12:42.
